properties.address: 120 Westway, Eastfield, YO11 3EF
properties.description: Eastfield Community Free fridges provides donated food to anyone in need (£1 charge) to avoid sending food to landfill. Food is donated by Morrisons, Bookers, Cooplands FareShare and Westway Open Arms and includes fridge items, bread, tins, packets, fresh fruit and veg and other items. Bring your own bag!
properties.title: Eastfield Community Free Fridge

properties.address: Gallows Close Centre, Endcliff Crescent, Scarborough, YO12 6HZ
properties.description: The Hub will be a warm space for anyone struggling. There will be access to games, internet, computers, and hot meals. Attending is free, for hot meals, anyone who is referred to us for support (e.g. food parcel or energy voucher) will receive a £1 voucher to purchase a hot drink and food in our warm space cafe.
properties.title: Gallows Close Friday Warm Hub
